readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You didn't learn this reading for 病 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

If you don't treat an <vocabulary>illness</vocabulary> right away you'll end up <reading>pay</reading>ing (ぺい) with your life. And if you don't die, you'll still have to pay a lot for doctor and hospital fees. Yuck.
